dt-example.title: Initialisation with Buttons
dt-example.info: Buttons can be initialised very easily though the `b-init buttons` object which can be given as an array of the buttons that you wish to display. The `-string B` option in the `dt-init dom` parameter will instruct DataTables where the buttons and the SearchPanes should be placed in the document - in this case, at the top left (CSS also plays a part).
